SA14bsa033_u:612: prajñayā na bhave sthānaṃ kṛpayā na śame sthitiḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:618: ubhayorlakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā pratipāditam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:619: nāpare na pare tīre nāntarāle tayoḥ sthitā /
SA14bsa033_u:624: anityādiṣoḍaśākārāṇāṃ sākṣātkāriṇī hīnayānajātīyā mahākaruṇāgarbhā māhāyānikaryasantatisthā prajñā asyāḥ sarvajñatāyā lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:625: iyaṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā prajñayā saṃsārādīnavadarśanāt na saṃsāre bhavānte sthitā /
SA14bsa033_u:627: darśanamārgaḥ bhāvanāmārgaḥ aśaikṣamārgaśceti trayo bhedā bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:628: duḥkhādicaturāryasatyasambaddhānityādiṣoḍaśākārāṇāṃ sākṣātkārī mahāyānabhāvanāmārgo 'syāḥ sarvajñatāyāḥ prajñatā na bhave sthānamitilakṣaṇātmikāyā upalakṣakaḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:632: iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā kṛpayā sattvārthakaraṇāt na nirvāṇe śamānte sthitā /
SA14bsa033_u:633: māhāyānikabhāvanāmārgīyāryapudgalasantatisthā mahākaruṇā asyāḥ kṛpayā na śame sthitiritimārgajñatāyā upalakṣikā /
SA14bsa033_u:635: māhāyānikasyāryasya sattvālambanā dharmālambanā nirālambanā ceti tisro mahākaruṇāḥ,
SA14bsa033_u:637: traiyadhvikadharmāṇāmanutpādākāreṇa tulyatāvabodhāt yā śrāvakādyagocaratvena viprakṛṣṭā bodhisattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā,
SA14bsa033_u:645: asya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena spaṣṭamullikhitam tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:648: śrāvakādīnām adhvasamatājñānābhāvāt anityādyākārāṇāṃ sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ sanimittopalambhayogena kṛpāprajñāvaikalyāt dūrībhūtaṃ jinajananyā iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:654: asya lakṣaṇādīnāṃ pratipādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena samyak kṛtam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:657: mahākaruṇayā śūnyatāsākṣātkāriṇyā prajñayā copāttaṃ māhāyānikaryāṇāṃ hīnayānajātīyam anityādyākārajñānam asya lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:658: "bodhisattvādīnāṃ tu utsāritabhāvābhiniveśabhrāntinimittānāṃ rūpādisarvadharmaparijñānameva tatsamatāparijñānamityataḥ samyagāsannībhāvo māturiti jñeyam /"
SA14bsa033_u:660: māhāyāniko darśanamārgaḥ, bhāvanāmārgaḥ, aśaikṣamārgaśceti trayo bhedā bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:664: asya lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayāṃ kārikayā suspaṣṭaṃ pratipāditam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:668: mahākaruṇā śūnyatāprajñābhyāṃ viyuktā bhāvolambhasvabhāvā hainayānikī vastujñateti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:669: "sarveṣāṃ rūpādīnāṃ traiyadhvikānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ sāsravānāsravobhayasthānīyānāmanupalambhasvarūpāṇāṃ sarvatra bhāvopalambhatayā te paraparikalpitātmādiśūnyatvena dṛṣṭāḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:670: anuṣṭhānasaṃjñā tu eteṣāṃ pratipakṣabhūtāpi viparyāsapravṛttatvena heyatvāt vipakṣo bhavati /"
SA14bsa033_u:672: asya bhedo 'vadhiścetyubhau 'anupāyena dūratvam ' ityasmin prakareṇa yathā pradarśitau, tadvat jñeyāditi /
SA14bsa033_u:674: asya lakṣaṇabhedādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ savistaramupadarśitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:682: mahākaruṇopāyena śūnyatāsākṣātkāriṇyā prajñayā copāttā māhāyānikāryasantatisthā vastujñatā pratipakṣalakṣaṇātmikā /
SA14bsa033_u:684: ubhāvapi pūrva 'upāyena avidūratā ' ityasmin prasaṅge yathāvarṇitau tathā jñātavyau /
SA14bsa033_u:686: jinajananyā dūratvam avidūratvamiti vastujñatāyāḥ (sarvajñatāyāḥ) dvau bhedau /
SA14bsa033_u:696: yathānirdiṣṭa eva śrāvakabodhisatvādīnāṃ vipakṣapratipakṣayorayaṃ vibhāgo 'vasātavyaḥ / tathā coktam -
SA14bsa033_u:697: evaṃ kṛtvā yathoktau vai jñeyaḥ sarvajñatānaye /
SA14bsa033_u:700: "śrāvakādīnāmevaṃ māturdūrībhāvenānuṣṭhānaṃ pratipakṣo 'pi san vastūpalambhaviparyāsapravṛttatvena bodhisattvānāṃ tyājyatvād vipakṣa iti" /
SA14bsa033_u:702: asya lakṣaṇabhedādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre sārdhadvayena kārikāgranthena savistaraṃ pratipāditam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:705: avikāro na kartā ca prayogo duṣkarastridhā /
SA14bsa033_u:709: sāṃvṛtike vastusvarūpe tadviśeṣe ca viparyāsapravṛttasya upalambhābhiniveśasya pratipakṣabhūto hīnayānajātīyaḥ sattvayogaḥ prayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:726: asyāḥ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena samādarśitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:731: pūrvokteṣu daśavidhaprayogeṣu pratisvaṃ catasraḥ amananā bhavantīti catvāriṃśadasyāḥ samatāyāḥ prabhedā bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:737: asya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre pañcabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ pratipāditam /
SA14bsa033_u:741: trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ trayāṇāṃ darśamārgāṇāṃ vyāvṛttibhedena ṣoḍaśa kṣaṇā evāsya ṣoḍaśa bhedā bhavantīti /
SA14bsa033_u:760: 11. upāyakauśalamityekādaśa dharmāḥ sarvākārābhisambodhamupalakṣayantīti abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāmupadarśitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:766: trisarvajñatāsambaddhānāṃ trisaptatyuttaraikaśatākārāṇāṃ bhāvanāmayyā prajñayopāttatvena vyavasthāpitaḥ satvayogaḥ sarvākārābhisambodha iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:775: ākāradṛṣṭyā trisaptatyuttaraśatam, prayogadṛṣṭyā viṃśatiḥ bhedā bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:779: ākārāṇāṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre pañcabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ savistaraṃ samyagupavarṇitam /
SA14bsa033_u:781: sarvākāramārgavastujñānasaṃgraheṇa trisarvajñatākārāṇāṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ prayogavaiśiṣṭyam ākārāṇāṃ lakṣaṇamiti /
SA14bsa033_u:787: caturāryasatyeṣu prathamataḥ trayāṇāṃ satyānāṃ pratyekaṃ catvāra iti dvādaśa,
SA14bsa033_u:792: catvāraḥ pratisatyaṃ te mārge pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ //
SA14bsa033_u:796: nirodhasatyasya ṣoḍaśa ceti mārgajñatāyāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśad ākārā bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:798: hetau mārge ca duḥkhe ca nirodhe ca yathākramam /
SA14bsa033_u:799: aṣṭau te sapta pañceti ṣoḍaśeti ca kīrtitāḥ //
SA14bsa033_u:802: buddhānāṃ sarvākārajñatāyā asādhāraṇā ekonacatvāriṃśacceti sarvākārajñatāyā daśottaraśatam ākārā bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:808: jñānākārebhyaḥ pūrvam arthākārāḥ parijñātavyā iti prathamataḥ trisaptatyuttaraśatam arthākārā upadarśitāḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:810: prayogāṇāṃ lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre catasṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ savistaraṃ suspaṣṭamupavarṇitam /
SA14bsa033_u:812: jñātṛjñeyayoḥ vastumārgākārāṇāṃ ca śamathavipaśyanāyuganaddhabhāvanāsvarūpaṃ niḥsvabhāvatāniṣprapañcātmakaṃ jñānamevātra sākṣānnirdiṣṭasya prayogasya lakṣaṇamiti /
SA14bsa033_u:813: athavā - trisarvajñatānāṃ yāvadākārāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāyuganaddhabhāvanāmayyā prajñayopāttaḥ sattvayoga evātra nirdiṣṭaprayogasya lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:814: yato hi 'kṛcchrāccireṇa prativodhataḥ ' ityanena nirdiṣṭaḥ sambhāramārgīyaḥ prayogo 'tra saṃgṛhīto bhavati /
SA14bsa033_u:826: na ca svapne 'pi ṣaṭpāramitācaryāsu dūrībhāva iti vyākaraṇalābhaprayogaḥ,
SA14bsa033_u:834: tadyathā paramārthato guṇadoṣāṇāṃ vṛddhiparihāṇyadarśanena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṇānujñānāt avṛddhyaparihāṇiprayogaḥ,
SA14bsa033_u:843: tasmāt paramaratnasvabhāvāyā mātuḥ saṃvatsareṇa bahvantarāyatve 'pi likhanaṃ śīghrameveti avadhiprayogaḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:845: guṇānāṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhenopadarśitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:851: tathā hi - pāramitāyāṃ udgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ mārakṛtavighnāḥ tathāgatānubhāvena vyāhanyanta iti māraśaktivyāghātaguṇaḥ,
SA14bsa033_u:866: prayogāṇāṃ doṣā abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena upadarśitāḥ / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:895: amī viśatiḥ doṣāḥ pāramitāyāṃ pravṛttasya yogino 'ntarāyakarāḥ pratipāditāḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:927: lakṣaṇasya pratipādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā kṛtam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:928: lakṣyate yena tajjñeyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ trividhaṃ ca tat /
SA14bsa033_u:929: jñānaṃ viśeṣaḥ kāritraṃ svabhāvo yaśca lakṣyate //
SA14bsa033_u:930: vistareṇa tu lakṣaṇānāṃ pratipādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre aṣṭādaśabhiḥ kārikabhiḥ samyag vihitam /
SA14bsa033_u:938: kāritralakṣaṇāni ekādaśa svabhāvalakṣaṇāni ṣoḍaśa ceti lakṣaṇānāṃ bhedā vistareṇa ekanavatiḥ bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:940: jñanalakṣaṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vistareṇa pratipādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre navabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ suspaṣṭaṃ vihitam /
SA14bsa033_u:943: kleśaliṅgādayo vakṣyamāṇāḥ svabhāvā eva eteṣāṃ upalakṣakāḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:948: sarvākārajñatāsaṃgṛhītāni jñānalakṣaṇāni ṣoḍaśa ceti tridhā bhedaḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:1019: viśeṣalakṣaṇānāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre samyagupadarśitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1027: māhāyānīyadarśanamārgīyakṣāntijñānakṣaṇāni ṣoḍhaśa śrāvakapratyekabuddhadarśanamārgasambaddhakṣāntijñānakṣaṇebhyo viśiṣṭatarāṇīti ṣoḍaśa bhedā bhavanti / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1028: duḥkhasatyālambanāni catuḥkṣaṇasaṃgṛhītāni kṣāntijñānāni kramaśaḥ acintyaviśeṣaḥ atulyaviśeṣaḥ,
SA14bsa033_u:1043: yena śrāvakādimārgebhyo bodhisattvādīnāṃ mārgajñatādidvaye viśeṣamārgo viśiṣyate /
SA14bsa033_u:1052: kāritrāṇāṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāṃ samyagāveditam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1053: hitaṃ sukhaṃ ca trāṇaṃ ca śaraṇaṃ layanaṃ nṛṇām /
SA14bsa033_u:1058: hitasukhatrāṇādiprativiśiṣṭajñānaiḥ sattvaprayogāḥ parārthasampādanasādhanaiḥ yojyanta iti tāni kāritralakṣaṇānyucyante /
SA14bsa033_u:1079: kāritrākārairevaṃ yathāvat sarvajñatātrayasya prayogā lakṣyanta iti kāritralakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1081: eteṣāṃ svabhāvalakṣaṇānāṃ svarūpapratipādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ samyag vihitam /
SA14bsa033_u:1107: ityevaṃ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ svabhāvairyathāvat trisarvajñatāprayogā lakṣyanta iti svabhāvalakṣaṇāni /
SA14bsa033_u:1114: lakṣīva lakṣyate ceti caturthaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ matam //
SA14bsa033_u:1115: ityevaṃ sāmānyena ekatra kṛtāni ekanavatiḥ lakṣaṇāni bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:1117: asya sarvaṃ lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā pratipāditam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1121: animittālambanajñānākāreṇa dānādyārabhya sarvākārajñatāparyantaṃ svasantāne samudāgame kauśalalakṣaṇo dharmābhisamaya evātra mokṣabhāgīyamiti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1123: māhāyāniko dharmābhisamayaḥ, māhāyānikaṃ mokṣabhāgīyam, māhāyānikaḥ sambhāramārga iti paryāyāḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:1129: svarūpataḥ śrutamayaṃ cintāmayaṃ bhāvanāmayamiti trividhaṃ mokṣabhāgīyamiṣṭam /
SA14bsa033_u:1134: saṃsārādīnavān mokṣaguṇāṃśa śrāvaṃ śrāvaṃ romaharṣodgamāśrupātādayo bhavanti,
SA14bsa033_u:1137: asya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre savistaraṃ pratipāditam /
SA14bsa033_u:1145: prathamaṃ ūṣmā, mūrdhā, kṣāntiḥ, agradharmaśceti catvāro bhedāḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:1146: eṣu caturṣu pratyekaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhedena trividha iti dvādaśa bhedā bhavati /
SA14bsa033_u:1157: avaivartikabodhisattvasaṃghasya svarūpaṃ ekayā kārikayā abhisamayālaṅkāre proktam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1165: paraśca prābandhikabhāvanāmārgastha iti trividho bhavati avaivartikabodhisattvasaṃgha iti trayo 'sya bhedā bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:1169: asya samatāprayogasya lakṣaṇādim abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā pratipāditam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1173: pṛṣṭhalabdhāvasthāyāmapi sattāgrāhakavikalpaparikṣayāt śauddhabhūmikaṃ jñānaṃ bhavaśamasamatāprayogasya lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1175: tisṛṇāṃ śuddhabhūmīnāṃ trīṇi jñānānyevāsya trayo bhedāḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:1179: prayogastāsya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā 'bhihitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1183: praṇidhānādikuśalamūlabalena svabuddhakṣetraṃ sattvabhājanalokātmakaṃ pariśodhitukāmasya śauddhabhūmikāni jñānānyeva kṣetraśuddhiprayogasya lakṣaṇāni /
SA14bsa033_u:1189: asyopāyakauśalaprayogasya svarūpādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāmupadarśitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1221: , ityaṣṭau dharmā mūrdhābhisamayamupalakṣayantīti abhisamayālaṅkāre pratipāditam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1224: pratyekaṃ darśanākhye ca bhāvanākhye ca vartmani /
SA14bsa033_u:1228: asyoṣmaṇo mūrdhaprayogasya svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayopadarśitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1232: svapne 'pi sarvadharmāṇāṃ svapnābhatvadarśanādiṣu dvādaśaliṅgeṣu anyatamasya prāptyā vyavasthāpitaḥ prathamo nirvedhabhāgīya ūṣmā mūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1235: nairātmyālambanāyā vidarśanāyāḥ prāptimārabhya bhūmiprāptiparyantamasya sīmā bhavati /
SA14bsa033_u:1237: asya mūrdhākhyasya mūrdhaprayogasya lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā paridīpitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1238: jambudvopajaneyattābuddhapūjāśubhādikām / upamāṃ bahudhā kṛtvā vivṛddhiḥ ṣoḍaśātmikā //
SA14bsa033_u:1240: puṇyavivṛddhyādiṣoḍaśavivṛddhīnāṃ pūrṇatayā māhāyāniko dvitīyo nirvedhabhāgīyo mūrdhā mūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1241: ayaṃ mūrdhā mūrdhaprayogaḥ mahāyānaprayogamārgīyo mūrdhaprayogaśceti samānārthakau /
SA14bsa033_u:1247: asya nirūḍhyākhyamūrdhaprayogasya sarvaṃ lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayopavarṇitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1252: anuttarā paripūriḥ nirūḍhyākhyastṛtīyo nirvedhabhāgīyaḥ kṣāntimūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1253: ayaṃ kṣāntyākhyo mūrdhaprayogaḥ māhāyānikaḥ prayogamārgīyakṣāntiprayogaśceti dvau samānārthakau /
SA14bsa033_u:1257: yathā māhāyānikāyāḥ prayogamārgīyāyāḥ kṣānteravadhistathā asyāpi prayogasyāvadhirjñātavyaḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:1259: asya agradharmākhyasya mūrdhaprayogasya lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā pratipāditam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1271: asya darśanamārgākhyasya mūrdhaprayogasya lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre savistaraṃ aṣṭādaśabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ pratipāditam /
SA14bsa033_u:1273: darśanaheyāyāḥ sattāgrāhikāyā dṛṣṭeḥ pratipakṣabhāvena vyavasthāpito māhāyānikaḥ satyābhisamayo darśanamārgākhyo mūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1274: ayaṃ darśanamārgākhyo mūrdhaprayogaḥ māhāyāniko darśanamārgaśca paryāyau /
SA14bsa033_u:1276: heyadṛṣṭyā darśanaprahātavyānāṃ caturṇāṃ vikalpānāṃ catvāraḥ pratipakṣā iti catvāro 'sya prabhedā bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:1281: asya bhāvanāmārgākhyasya mūrdhaprayogasya sarvaṃ lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre navabhiḥ kārikābhiḥ savistaramabhihitam /
SA14bsa033_u:1283_1: dṛṣṭyā vyavasthāpito māhāyāniko 'nvabhisamayaḥ bhāvanāmārgākhyo mūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1285: bhāvanāheyānāṃ navānāṃ vikalpānāṃ sākṣāt pratipakṣabhūtā navānantaryamārgāḥ,
SA14bsa033_u:1286: nava ca vimuktimārgā iti aṣṭādaśa asya bhāvanāmārgākhyasya mūrdhaprayogasya bhedā bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:1288: prathamāṃ bhūmimārabhya daśamīṃ bhūmiṃ yāvadasya sīmā bhavatīti /
SA14bsa033_u:1290: buddhatvaprāpteravyavahito yaḥ pūrvasamanantaraḥ samādhiḥ, so 'tra ānantaryasamādhiḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:1291: asya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvaṃ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ samyak pratipāditam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1299_1: avyavahitatvena sākṣādutpādakaḥ paryantayogaḥ ānantaryasamādhyākhyo mūrdhaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1302: ekakṣaṇikāścatvāraḥ prayoga evāsya catvāro bhedā bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:1306_1: 'tra nirākarttavyā bhavantīti tāsāṃ vipratipattīnāṃ sarvaṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ svarūpam
SA14bsa033_u:1306_2: abhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ savistaraṃ samyak pratipāditam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1309: prayoge triṣu ratneṣu sopāye samaye muneḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:1314: saṃvṛtiparamārthasatyayordvayoḥ svabhāvata ekatvalakṣaṇayoḥ agrahaṇarūpāḥ sammukhībhūtavikalpāḥ tadbījāni vā nirākarttavyā vipratipattaya iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1317: tathā hi - saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtadhātvorabhāvatvena ālambanopapattauḥ sarvathā nīrūpatvād ālambanasvabhāvadhāraṇe,
SA14bsa033_u:1330: svasāmānyalakṣaṇānupapattyā bhāvanāyāṃ ceti sarvākārajñatādhiṣṭhānāḥ saṃśayarūpāḥ ṣoḍaśa vipratipattayo bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:1331: tāḥ yathāsambhavamubhayasatyāśritopāyakauśalena nirākṛtya samyak sarvathā niścayamutpādya kalyāṇakāmaiḥ bodhisattvairānantaryasamādhiradhigantavyaḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:1332: etāsu kalpanātmikā vipratipattayo mukhyāḥ, yāśca prasaṅgamukhenoktāstā gauṇā iti mantavyāḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:1333: etāḥ ṣoḍaśāpi vipratipattayo kalpanātmikā śabdātmikā ceti dvayorantarbhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:1334: dvayoḥ satyayorekamālambya yadaparaṃ nirākaroti tad abhiniveśātmakaṃ jñānameva kalpanātmikā vipratipattiḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:1335: dvayoḥ satyayorekaṃ nimittīkṛtya yā aparaṃ nirākaroti sā vāk śabdātmikā vipratipattiaravaseyā /
SA14bsa033_u:1341: ānupūrvikābhisamayasya svarūpanirdeśaḥ abhisamayālaṅkāre saṃkṣepataḥ kārikāśena kṛtaḥ / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1343: vistaratastu tasya lakṣaṇādikamanayā ekayā kārikayopanyastam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1344: dānena prajñayā yāvad buddhādau smṛtibhiśca sā /
SA14bsa033_u:1347: sarvākārajñatāditrisarvajñatākārān adhigatān anupūrvīkṛtya prajñābhāvanayopāttaḥ sattvayogaḥ ānupūrvikaprayoga iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1352: yo 'dhigamaḥ sa ānupūrvikābhisamayastrayodaśavidha ityasya trayodaśa bhedā bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:1358: ekakṣaṇābhisambodhasya svarūpanirdeśaḥ abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena saṃkṣepataḥ kṛtaḥ / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1362: adhigatatrisarvajñatākāreṣu svabhyastasteṣāmeva kṣaṇenaikenādhigamarūpaḥ paryantayogaḥ ekakṣaṇābhisambodha iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1366: caturvidho bhavati, yathā - avipākalakṣaṇaḥ, vipākalakṣaṇaḥ alakṣaṇalakṣaṇaḥ, advayalakṣaṇaśceti /
SA14bsa033_u:1368: asya sarvaṃ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā parīdīpitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1374: asya sarvaṃ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā samyagabhihitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1378: yadā bodhisattvasya pratipakṣabhāvanayā sarvavipakṣakalaṅkāpagamena sakalavyavadānapakṣavipākadharmatāvasthā śuklasvabhāvā jātā,
SA14bsa033_u:1379: tadā ekasminneva kṣaṇe vipākāvasthāprāptānām anāsravadharmāṇāṃ bodhāt jñānaṃ (prajñāpāramitā)
SA14bsa033_u:1383: asya svarūpādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā suspaṣṭamupavarṇitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1387_2: alakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmā iti saṃkleśavyavadānarūpāṇāṃ sarvadharmāṇāmekenaiva kṣaṇena
SA14bsa033_u:1390: asyādvayalakṣaṇasya svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā spaṣṭamupadarśitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1394: nirantaradīrghakāladvayapratibhāsaprahāṇābhyāsasātmībhāvād unmīlitadvayapratibhāsavāsano yadā bodhisattvo grāhyagrāhakayogena svapnaṃ grāhyaṃ svapnadarśinaṃ grāhakaṃ nekṣate,
SA14bsa033_u:1395: tadā sarve 'pyevaṃdharmāṇo dharmā iti dharmāṇāmadvayaṃ tattvamekenaiva kṣaṇena paśyati,
SA14bsa033_u:1402: aya ityadhigama ityevaṃ antimakāle dānādisarvānāsravadharmāṇāmaviparītaḥ samyak prativedhaḥ ekakṣaṇābhisambodha ityucyate /
SA14bsa033_u:1408: vipākabhūtasya dharmakāyasya saṃkṣiptanirdeśaḥ abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā paridīpitaḥ / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1414: sambhāradvayasaṃcayabalena prāptāḥ paryantaguṇā eva phalabhūto dharmakāya iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1422: asya svābhāvikakāyasyopapādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā kṛtam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1423: sarvākārāṃ viśuddhiṃ ye dharmāḥ prāptā nirāsravāḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:1432: asya jñānakāyasya svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre pañcabhiḥ kārikābhirupadarśitam /
SA14bsa033_u:1434: yāvajjñānaṃ yathāvajjñānaṃ cāpekṣya sākṣātkāri paryantajñāna jñānadharmakāya iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1437: buddhabhūmau anāsravajñānānāmekaviṃśatiḥ jñānavargā evāsya ekaviṃśatiḥ prabhedāḥ / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1474: sambhogakāyasya svarūpavarṇanam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā kṛtam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1478: sthānakāyaparivāradharmakālākhyaiḥ pañcabhirviniyatairvirśiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ sambhogakāya iti lakṣaṇam /
SA14bsa033_u:1484: ayaṃ sambhogakāyo buddhabhūmau akaniṣṭhaghanavyūhakṣetre eva kevalaṃ bhavati /
SA14bsa033_u:1486: kāyasyāsya nairmāṇikasya svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikayā ekayā samyagupavarṇitam / tathā hi -
SA14bsa033_u:1487: karoti yena citrāṇi hitāni jagataḥ samam /
SA14bsa033_u:1488: ā bhavāt so 'nupacchinnaḥ kāyo nairmāṇiko muneḥ //
SA14bsa033_u:1491: yena śākyamunitathāgatādirūpeṇa āsaṃsāraṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ samīhitamarthaṃ samaṃ karoti,
SA14bsa033_u:1492: asau kāyaḥ prabandhatayā anuparato nairmāṇiko buddhasya bhagavataḥ sarvabālajanasādhāraṇaścaturtho 'vasātavyaḥ /
SA14bsa033_u:1499: imāni bhagavato vicitrāṇi kāritrāṇi abhisamayālaṅkāre saptabhiḥ kārikābhirvistaraśo nirdiṣṭāni /
SA14bsa033_u:1503: gatipraśamanakāritrata ārabhya nirvāṇaniveśanaparyantaṃ saptaviṃśatiḥ karmāṇyevāsya saptaviṃśatiḥ prabhedā bhavanti /
SA14bsa033_u:1506: gatīnāṃ śamanaṃ karmaṃ saṃgrahe ca caturvidhe //
SA14bsa033_u:1527: vineyajanapratibhāsabhāk saptaviṃśatiprakāraṃ karma avicchinnatayā āsaṃsāraṃ pravartate /
SA14bsa033_u:1532_0: aṣṭapadārthopalakṣakāṇāṃ ca saptateḥ padārthānāṃ prakāśakamidaṃ subhāṣitaṃ jagadguroḥ
SA14bsa033_u:1532_1: maitreyanāthasya mukhānniḥ-sṛtasyāgamasya caturdikṣuḥ prasārāya lokasya ca sanmārgārohaṇāya
SA14bsa033_u:1536: sarve 'mī jananīnibandhanakṛtād bījānmayāptācchubhāt sarvākāravarā bhavantu niyataṃ kāyatrayaprāpiṇaḥ //
